The user places a [[sealing tag]] on the designated area. If anyone crosses it, whether it be an ally or an enemy, [[toads]] are [[Summoning Technique|summon]]ed to stop them. This technique is useful to protect an object from falling into enemy hands, and it is said that only [[Jiraiya]] and [[Minato]] were able to remove it. Those wishing to release the seal must perform the required [[hand seals]] and then point at it, which will cause any summoned toad to depart.

== Trivia ==
* The [[Genjutsu World]] version of [[Jiraiya]] is able to use this technique.<ref>''Road to Ninja: Naruto the Movie''</ref>
